alert.note: Alert for Mobile (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 07 at 9:31PM CST until February 10 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Bayou Sara At Saraland affecting Mobile County. For the Bayou Sara...including Saraland...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Sara At Saraland. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 4.0 feet, Flooding of streets begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 4.0 feet. An updated stage is expected to be provided later this evening. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
